Calculate enthalpy of vaporization

Source: R/evap.R
enthalpy_vap.Rd

This function calculates the temperature-dependent enthalpy of vaporization (latent heat of vaporization).

enthalpy_vap(tc)

Arguments

tc

double, air temperature, degrees C.

Value

double, J/kg.

References

Eq. 8, Henderson‐Sellers, B., 1984. A new formula for latent heat of vaporization of water as a function of temperature. Quarterly Journal of the Royal Meteorological Society, 110(466), pp.1186-1190. doi:10.1002/qj.49711046626

Contents

Developed by Tyler W. Davis, Iain Colin Prentice, Benjamin D. Stocker, Rebecca T. Thomas, Rhys J. Whitley, Han Wang, Bradley J. Evans, Angela V. Gallego-Sala, Martin T. Sykes, Wolfgang Cramer, Roberto Villegas-Diaz.
